2.2.8.en: Fix RGBW light temperature mode. Thanks to aartse for contributing his fix.

2.2.9.en: Change FGWPx-102 default LED parameters, thanks to Caseda for notifying us. Fixed a value issue for the FGD-212 brightness parameters, thanks to Thorarin for his fix.

2.2.10.en: Fixed FGD-212, FGS-212, FGS-213, FGS-223, LED Mode for Plug 102

2.4.0.en: Added Walli Switch and Walli Rollershutter
2.4.0.nl: Walli schakelaar en Walli rolluikschakelaar toegevoegd.

2.4.3.en: Walli Switch now works in single and double mode.
2.4.3.nl: Walli Schakelaar werkt nu in enkele en dubbele modus.

2.4.4.en: Bugfixes for various devices (Dimmer 2, Smart Implant).
2.4.4.nl: Optimalisatie voor verschillende apparaten (Dimmer 2, Smart Implant).
